requests.name: json-response-test
html-response-test
environment-variables-test
requests.preRequestScript:
export {};
hopp.env.set('test_key', 'test_value')
hopp.env.set('recursive_key', '<<test_key>>')
hopp.env.global.set('global_key', 'global_value')
hopp.env.active.set('active_key', 'active_value')

// `pm` namespace equivalents
pm.variables.set('pm_test_key', 'pm_test_value')
pm.environment.set('pm_active_key', 'pm_active_value')
pm.globals.set('pm_global_key', 'pm_global_value')

requests.preRequestScript:
export {};
pm.environment.set('to_unset1', 'value1')
pm.environment.set('to_unset2', 'value2')
pm.environment.set('to_clear1', 'clear_value1')
pm.environment.set('to_clear2', 'clear_value2')
pm.environment.set('to_clear3', 'clear_value3')
pm.globals.set('global_to_unset', 'global_value')
pm.globals.set('global_to_clear1', 'global_clear1')
pm.globals.set('global_to_clear2', 'global_clear2')

requests.name: pm-request-mutation-test
pm-url-property-mutations-test
requests.preRequestScript:
export {};
// Test URL object property mutations
pm.request.url.protocol = 'http'
pm.request.url.host = ['echo', 'hoppscotch', 'io']
pm.request.url.path = ['v2', 'test']
pm.request.url.port = '443'
pm.request.url.query.add({ key: 'new', value: 'param' })
pm.request.url.query.remove('old')

requests.name: unsupported-features-test

export {}; const unsupportedApis = [ { api: 'pm.info.iteration', script: () => { const x = pm.info.iteration }, errorMessage: /Collection Runner feature/ }, { api: 'pm.info.iterationCount', script: () => { const x = pm.info.iterationCount }, errorMessage: /Collection Runner feature/ }, { api: 'pm.collectionVariables.get()', script: () => pm.collectionVariables.get('test'), errorMessage: /use environment or request variables instead/ }, { api: 'pm.collectionVariables.set()', script: () => pm.collectionVariables.set('key', 'value'), errorMessage: /use environment or request variables instead/ }, { api: 'pm.collectionVariables.unset()', script: () => pm.collectionVariables.unset('key'), errorMessage: /use environment or request variables instead/ }, { api: 'pm.collectionVariables.has()', script: () => pm.collectionVariables.has('key'), errorMessage: /use environment or request variables instead/ }, { api: 'pm.collectionVariables.clear()', script: () => pm.collectionVariables.clear(), errorMessage: /use environment or request variables instead/ }, { api: 'pm.collectionVariables.toObject()', script: () => pm.collectionVariables.toObject(), errorMessage: /use environment or request variables instead/ }, { api: 'pm.collectionVariables.replaceIn()', script: () => pm.collectionVariables.replaceIn('{{test}}'), errorMessage: /use environment or request variables instead/ }, { api: 'pm.vault.get()', script: () => pm.vault.get('test'), errorMessage: /Postman Vault feature/ }, { api: 'pm.vault.set()', script: () => pm.vault.set('key', 'value'), errorMessage: /Postman Vault feature/ }, { api: 'pm.vault.unset()', script: () => pm.vault.unset('key'), errorMessage: /Postman Vault feature/ }, { api: 'pm.iterationData.get()', script: () => pm.iterationData.get('test'), errorMessage: /Collection Runner feature/ }, { api: 'pm.iterationData.set()', script: () => pm.iterationData.set('key', 'value'), errorMessage: /Collection Runner feature/ }, { api: 'pm.iterationData.unset()', script: () => pm.iterationData.unset('key'), errorMessage: /Collection Runner feature/ }, { api: 'pm.iterationData.has()', script: () => pm.iterationData.has('key'), errorMessage: /Collection Runner feature/ }, { api: 'pm.iterationData.toObject()', script: () => pm.iterationData.toObject(), errorMessage: /Collection Runner feature/ }, { api: 'pm.iterationData.toJSON()', script: () => pm.iterationData.toJSON(), errorMessage: /Collection Runner feature/ }, { api: 'pm.execution.setNextRequest()', script: () => pm.execution.setNextRequest('next'), errorMessage: /Collection Runner feature/ }, { api: 'pm.execution.skipRequest()', script: () => pm.execution.skipRequest(), errorMessage: /Collection Runner feature/ }, { api: 'pm.execution.runRequest()', script: () => pm.execution.runRequest(), errorMessage: /Collection Runner feature/ }, { api: 'pm.sendRequest()', script: () => pm.sendRequest('https://example.com', () => {}), errorMessage: /not yet implemented/ }, { api: 'pm.visualizer.set()', script: () => pm.visualizer.set('

Test

'), errorMessage: /Postman Visualizer feature/ }, { api: 'pm.visualizer.clear()', script: () => pm.visualizer.clear(), errorMessage: /Postman Visualizer feature/ }, { api: 'pm.require()', script: () => pm.require('lodash'), errorMessage: /not supported in Hoppscotch/ }, ] unsupportedApis.forEach(({ api, script, errorMessage }) => { pm.test(`${api} throws descriptive error`, () => { pm.expect(script).to.throw(errorMessage) }) })
